channel.title: Apex-Official Realese
channel.description:
[url=http://www.Apex718.org]www.Apex718.org[/url] is updated daily with exclusive updates and bug fixes,Apex's economy is one of the best Economy's around! The exp rates are splendid and the game is simple to get around in!
[img]http://i61.tinypic.com/20rtwr5.png[/img]
Auto-Vote/Auto-Donate! Highscores! All Godwars Bosses with real kill count and frozen keys! Korasi Spec
100% Summoning
Crucible
Mature Community
Active Owner & Staff
PK
PVM
Economy Server
Items Kept on Death (Except Wilderness)
Frost Dragons
Glacors
Custom Boss
Custom Home
Shops
Decent Exp and Drop Rates
Great Economy
Nomad
Dragonbone Armor
Squeal of Fortune
24/7 DEDI Hosting
Polypore Dungeon
100% Clanwars
100% Castle Wars
Custom Real Dungeoneering
Fun Daily Events
Nomad
Polypore Dung
Runespan (fully working)
All Drygore Weapons Kalphite King (50% added)
And More! Join TODAY!
¤Media of Apex¤
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7v.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7m.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7P.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ89.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ8d.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ8h.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7U.jpeg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imm.io/1gJ7E.jpeg[/img]
¤Finished Updates¤
[B]-New Ranks
-No Dupes
-New Boss
-3 custom armors
-Donator only bosses (drops elite void)
-New Items and Npc For Shops
-Most to all of hidden shops disabled/gone
-Fixed Lots of bugged random shops around world
-Added new commands
-Fixed Nex Bugs
-Fixed Donor shops
-Almost fully fixed sof
-Added Onyx Bolts to shops
-Moderator+ Panel
-Starters Added
-Buffed Glacors
-Lowered Drop Rates on Glacors
-Fixed Yell Bugs
-Added Barrelchest
-Switched Sources
-New Home on the New source
-Fixed Altars
-Ckey Chest Added
-New Shops
-Fixed Exp Rates
-Fixed Comp Cape
-Added Skiller Shop
-Added a way to get to Clanwars
-Fully Added Rune Span
-New BackGround
Started Updates
-V.I.P Rank
-Extreme Donator Rank/Zone
-Working on 100% Drygores
Not Started Updates
-Daily Task System w/ Rewards
-Stealing Creation [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/2198110_orig.jpg[/img]

item.title: Apex-Official Realese
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yeah, there is no look shown (at least I don’t see one as the one above). Also, there looks like there went a bit TOO much editing into these images and I think it’s a bit of an overkill but other than that I wish for the best of luck.

Read full topic
